item.title: MOS 6502 CPU emulator
item.description: A basic CPU emulation project I made to refresh my architecture knowledge. The emulator mimics the CPU down to the register level. I aim to have 100% coverage of all legal opcodes, read/write bus callback, and opcode selection via jump table. Followed the amazing guide by @javidx9 | Github
